name: Satoko's Adventure
description:
The world has changed a lot in the last few centuries. So the little pink cat Satoko meets the Shinto god of the bamboo forest in an old temple to ask the cat to explore the world for him. Satoko begins his journey in the bamboo forest, where he has to test his agility as a cat because the old bamboo forest has not been maintained for a long time. Deadly traps and enemies makes his way more difficult and create further obstacles that he has to overcome quickly. At the end he returns to a small temple to the Shinto god and explains him the changes that have taken place over the past few centuries. Interactive tutorial:  


Controls:Move - AD / left stickJump/Double Jump - SPACE / south buttonDash - SHIFT / west buttonInteract - E / north button

Alien audience:
Features: Full controller support Interactive In-Game Tutorial  Great japanese painting style Kitten agility skills
  Small hints: How to install: 1. Download 2. Unpack 3. Run Satoko's_Adventure.exe 4. Explore the world
Credits: Game created by Jule Lewitzki Japanese Garden by DHDMusic (CC-BY-ND-NC)Night in Tokyo Font Family by Vladimir Nikolic(1001Fonts Free For Commercial Use License (FFC)) We Love Indies
